post.author: 고상호
post.content:
Hi
I am contacting you regarding the following opportunity for J2EE developers we have active at Accenture Consulting in Vancouver BC.
Please let me know if you are interested and I will call you with more information on these exciting positions with one of Canada's leading employers.
Damian McElgunn Accenture Consulting Vancouver BC Canada
Tel: 604 646 5154
Damian.McElgunn@Accenture.com
www.accenture.com
Job description : J2EE Developers
Software Developers are responsible for providing software development capability to support the delivery of programs and projects corresponding to the priorities assigned by Information Systems Management. They will perform coding and package configuration as well as prepare and perform component and assembly test plans. They will provide secondary support toward the installation of application releases into production. Candidates will be strong technically and capable of recognizing and resolving design issues as well as anticipating, identifying, tracking and resolving issues affecting deliverables.
Qualifications:
• Java/J2EE • Functional knowledge in billing, customer care and network activation and management • Object oriented methodology knowledge • Portal architecture and development Oracle/ Websphere an asset
post.title: J2EE with Accenture in Vancouver
